poem:
**Another Side**

among the beats and bass,  
a shadow whispers—  
Sean behind the music,  
a different rhythm,  
a darker dance.  
Three voices rise  
from unseen depths,  
telling stories  
of coercion's quiet grip,  
echoing down corridors  
where fame and power  
once paraded.  
In the spotlight,  
another truth waits  
to be unveiled.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Prosecutors say Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs ‘ran a criminal enterprise’ as sex-trafficking trial begins Prosecutors in the high-profile racketeering and sex-trafficking trial of Sean “Diddy” Combs declared during opening statements on Monday morning that “there was another side” to the hip-hop mogul, saying that he “ran a criminal enterprise” and noting that three women would testify during the trial who can speak to Combs’s alleged coercion and/or sexual misconduct. Combs, 55, was arrested in September 2024". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Prosecutors say Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs ‘ran a criminal enterprise’ as sex-trafficking trial begins Prosecutors in the high-profile racketeering and sex-trafficking trial of Sean “Diddy” Combs declared during opening statements on Monday morning that “there was another side” to the hip-hop mogul, saying that he “ran a criminal enterprise” and noting that three women would testify during the trial who can speak to Combs’s alleged coercion and/or sexual misconduct. Combs, 55, was arrested in September 2024
